en:
Teukros (labelled), standing 3/4-view to the right, with his weight on
      his right leg, legs crossed, wearing a blue and pink himation, a scabbard strap over his right
      shoulder, yellow boots, gold hair, rests his right hand on his hip, and reaches his left hand
      behind the nude baby Eurysakes (labelled) (with gold hair), kneeling 3/4-view to the right,
      with his right leg falling behind, and his left knee on the lap of a female figure (perhaps
      Tekmessa), to whom he reaches up both arms. She is seated 3/4-view to the left on a throne,
      with her head tilted down, wearing a long-sleeved, green chiton, a blue-white himation around
      her legs and the back of her chair, yellow slippers, long gold hair; Adonis (labelled), seated
      profile to the right on a klismos, wearing a blue himation around his legs and over the back
      of the klismos, rests his right elbow on the back of the klismos, and reaches his left arm to
      the right shoulder of Peitho; nude Eros, with gold hair and wings, leaning 3/4-view to the
      right over the left arm of Adonis, with both arms resting on Adonis' arm, looks up to Peitho
      (labelled), standing frontal, with her head turned 3/4-view to the left, wearing a pink
      himation over a pink medium-sleeved, chiton veiled over her head, braided gilded hair, and
      pendant earrings, resting her right hand on the lap of Adonis, and raising her left arm;
      Aphrodite (labelled), seated profile to the left on a throne, wearing a belted sleeveless
      chiton, a pink and green himation around her lower body, veiled over her gold hair, and held
      above her shoulder in her right hand, a red sakkos, a beaded necklace, disk earrings, and a
      twisted band on her left wrist, holds a gilded mirror in her left
      hand.

<bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 7.245 s.v. Peitho no. 20, pl. 179 (N.
      Icard-Gianolio); <bibl>Shapiro 1993</bibl>, 205-206, 260 no. 131, fig. 167;
      <bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 4.111 s.v. Eurysakes no. 1, pl. 56 (O. Touchefeu);
      <bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 1.224 s.v. Adonis no. 9 (B. Servais-Soyez), s.v. Aphrodite no.
      1267 (A. Delivorrias); <bibl>Schefold 1981</bibl>, 286 figs. 406-407; G. Kopcke,
      "Sitzung am 5. November 1968,"" <hi rend="ital">AA</hi> 1969, 547 figs. 2-5; E.A.
      Zervoudaki, "Attische Polychrome Reliefkeramik," <hi rend="ital">AM</hi> 83 (1968)
      32 no. 59, pl. 3.1-2, 4.3; G. Kopcke, "Golddekorierte attische Schwarzfirniskeramik des
      vierten Jahrhunderts v. Chr.," <hi rend="ital">AM</hi> 79 (1964) 47, 64; A.A.
      Peredolskaja, <hi rend="ital">Truky Otdela</hi> 1 (Leningrad 1945) 56;
      <bibl>Furtwngler 1895, 487 no. 5 ["aryballos"]</bibl>.
